import styles from "../styles/Home.module.css"; import logo from "../images/century.jpg"; import { useState } from "react"; function EnquiryForm() { const [frontUploaded, setFrontUploaded] = useState(false); var displayImage = function (event) { var image = document.getElementById("output"); image.src = URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0]); }; return (
); } export default EnquiryForm;
